title: STREET HYPNOSIS & SOMNAMBULISM / NON-VERBAL HYPNOSIS
description:
Dr. Marco Paret induced a strong hypnotic induction and somnambulism state on the street. Deep states of mind are very useful as they will bring your client to another dimension of being, where they will feel their entanglement with the universe in a different way. They will often feel transformed after returning from this wonderful state. This video was captured in one of Dr. Paret's non-verbal hypnosis masterclasses, where he teaches the ancient techniques of Mesmerism & Fascination - the power of the gaze. Learn all of these powerful non-verbal hypnosis techniques in Dr. Marco Paret's school. Check our free course on www.mesmerism.info 

Dr. Marco Paret is the world's leading authority in Non-Verbal Hypnotism.
